Title: Wokini.
Subtitle: A Lakota Journey to Happiness and Self-understanding.
Authors: Billy Mills;Nicholas Sparks.

Description: "Wokini, " translated from Lakota, means "seeking a new beginning." On that theme, the famous athlete joins the bestselling author to blend modern therapeutic principles and Native American tradition..
